data.eml:eml: Three new species of Tasmaniosoma Verhoeff, 1936 (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Dalodesmidae) from northeast Tasmania, Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mesibov, Robert (2015): Three new species of Tasmaniosoma Verhoeff, 1936 (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Dalodesmidae) from northeast Tasmania, Australia. ZooKeys 488: 31-46, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.488.9460, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.488.9460
